title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump's Open-Ended Commitment on Afghanistan
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump's Open-Ended Commitment on Afghanistan
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Toluse Olorunnipa White House Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing President Trump's announcement of an open-ended commitment to Afghanistan to battle jihadists. Jonathan Bernstein, Bloomberg View Columnist also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
